sentences.en: All the money has been raised by voluntary contribution.
sentences.cn: 所有这些钱都是靠自愿捐献筹集的。

sentences.en: By his suggestion the contribution was raised.
sentences.cn: 根据他的倡议而发起了募捐.

sentences.en: China ought to make a greater contribution to humanity.
sentences.cn: 中国应当对人类作出较大贡献.

sentences.en: Einstein was awarded the Nobel Prize for his contribution to Quantum Theory.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦因对量子论的贡献而获授诺贝尔奖。

sentences.en: He was expected to make a very positive contribution to the 1996 Games organisation.
sentences.cn: 人们期待他为1996年奥运会的组织做出积极的贡献。

sentences.en: Her contribution to the research went largely unacknowledged.
sentences.cn: 她对这项研究的贡献大都被忽略了。

sentences.en: His new contribution to the advancement of physiology was well appreciated.
sentences.cn: 他对生理学发展的新贡献获得高度赞赏.

sentences.en: It's no good asking him for a contribution ; you'll have no joy from him.
sentences.cn: 不必要他捐助什么, 从他那里你得不到什么.

sentences.en: Peter Mumford's lighting and David Freeman's direction make a crucial contribution to the success of the staging.
sentences.cn: 彼得·芒福德的灯光和戴维·弗里曼的导演对演出的成功功不可没。

sentences.en: The Chinese people should make a greater contribution to mankind.
sentences.cn: 中国人应当对人类有较大的贡献.

sentences.en: The laxity of export control authorities has made a significant contribution to the problem.
sentences.cn: 出口控制部门工作懈怠，是造成此问题的重要原因。

sentences.en: The money came from world - wide contribution.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱是世界各地捐赠的.

sentences.en: The school sees its job as preparing students to make a contribution to society.
sentences.cn: 这所学校以培养学生为社会作贡献为己任。

sentences.en: There are people who swell with pride whenever they make some small contribution.
sentences.cn: 有些人出了一点力就觉得了不起.

sentences.en: This is a significant contribution to knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这是对知识的重大贡献.

sentences.en: to make a contribution to charity
We made a contribution to the famine relief fund.
sentences.cn: 我们给饥荒赈济基金捐了款.

words.tran_cn: 出资的；贡献的；有助于；助长...的
捐助的；贡献的；有助于…的

phrases.tran_cn: 固定缴款；固定供款计划
捐赠，贡献给；为…做出贡献

trans.tran_cn: 贡献，捐款，定期缴款，稿件
trans.tran_en: something that you give or do in order to help something be successful
